attributes.action: Save Shambo at Skanda Vale Monastary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Skanda Vale Petition to Save Shambo

I support the Skanda Vale Monastery (Charity No. 511166) in their stand against the Government and DEFRA to oppose the unnecessary killing of the sacred temple Bull, Shambo, and the desecration of the Skanda Vale Temples and the Hindu religion.
We demand that the Government withdraw its Notification of Slaughter and engage constructively with the Skanda Vale Monastery management to fulfil both the objectives of DEFRA to safeguard public health and protect the economic interests of the agricultural community, whilst upholding the religious beliefs of the Hindu community and other faiths for whom all life is sacred.
The Skanda Vale Monastery is not a commercial farming enterprise, but a sanctuary for all life and a registered place of worship. As such we demand that the Hindu religious beliefs be protected under the democratic principles of this great nation.

Please respect the Hindu religious beliefs by over-ruling the above mentioned Notice of Slaughter.
